title: [Health] Study on 21 older adults between ages 68 and 78 who walked an average of about 4,000 steps per day before the study, found that adding about 3,000 steps per day, can significantly reduce high blood pressure

[Health] The Impact of Improperly Sized Blood Pressure Cuffs on Health Readings - A recent study has shown that using the wrong-sized cuff during blood pressure monitoring can lead to inaccurate readings. This could potentially lead to misdiagnoses, or unnecessary worry
